leve.name: The Awry Salvages
leve.description: In the vastness of Coerthas, the Badgers toil to gather materials for study from the wreck of the Agrius, the flagship of the Garlean fleet. The work has been beset with difficultyâ”€looters chief among them, but beastkin and cloudkin aplenty. Protect the material from a group of gigas that trundles this way even as we speak.
leve.client: The Order of the Twin Adder Blue Badgers
